qas.question: By how much did the MoD go over its equipment budget?
When was the overbudget amount discovered?
What are some of the criticisms that have been directed at the MoD?

answers.text: up to 10 and even as much as 15 years

plausible_answers.text: 10 and even as much as 15 years

context: In <a1_0>2013<a1_0/> it was found that the Ministry of Defence had overspent on its equipment budget by <a0_0><b9_0>£6.5bn<b9_0/><a0_0/> on orders that could take <a3_0>up to <b6_0><b7_0>39 years<b7_0/><b6_0/><a3_0/> to fulfil. The Ministry of Defence has been criticised in the past for <a2_0>poor management and <b8_0>financial control<b8_0/><a2_0/>, investing in projects that have taken <a4_0>up to <b5_0>10 and even as much as 15 years<b5_0/><a4_0/> to be delivered.
